message.content:
We need to determine the overall depreciation expense that will appear on the income statement. In the provided transactions, you can see two separate entries with “Depreciation” as the type:

• Depreciation20240101001 on 2024‑01‑01 has an amount of 45,746.47  
• Depreciation20240201002 on 2024‑02‑01 has an amount of 45,741.88

For the income statement the “depreciation” line normally reports the total depreciation expense for the period. In our case we add these two amounts:

  45,746.47 + 45,741.88 = 91,488.35

Thus, the final depreciation item (the total depreciation expense) is 91,488.35.

Below is the answer in the required json format.

```json
{"solution": {"Depreciation": "91488.35"} }
```
